import React, { useState } from 'react' export default function Spotify() { const [song,setSong]=useState([]); const [artist,setArtist]=useState(""); const [songName,setSongName]=useState(""); const [rdate,setRdate]=useState(Date()); const [file,setFile]=useState(); const [songBool,setSongBool]=useState(false); const handleClick=()=>{ setSongBool(true); } const handleSubmit=e=>{ setSong(...song,{name :songName,artistName:artist,date: rdate,icon:file}); setSongBool(false); } return (
  • Home
